definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

sentences.english: The hotel is conveniently located at the junction of Jingyang Road and West Ring Road right in the center of Luyuan District.
sentences.chinese: 酒店地处于绿园区中心的景阳大路与西环城路交汇处。

sentences.english: The panoramic view of the Mangkang County Mangkang County is the interchange of the south and north Sichuan-Tibet lines.
sentences.chinese: 《芒康县全景》芒康县也是川藏南北线进藏的交汇处。

sentences.english: There is one bus station on the corner of Huanghe Road and Wusi Road.
sentences.chinese: 在黄河路和五四路交汇处的拐角上有一个汽车站。

sentences.english: The repulsion point is composition of pressure point and joining place.
sentences.chinese: 斥力点，和压力点交汇处叫合力。

sentences.english: From there you can see where the Changjiang River and the Jialing River meet.
sentences.chinese: 从那里可以看到长江与嘉陵江的交汇处。

sentences.english: Junction between two rivers there is a small island like a bird paradise.
sentences.chinese: 两河之间的交汇处有一小岛，犹如一个雀鸟天堂。

sentences.english: Elephant Trunk Hill juts out into the Li River where it joins the Peach Blossom River.
sentences.chinese: 象鼻山在漓江与桃花河交汇处突兀地显现出来。

sentences.english: New Tai Wai Station will be the intersection station of two MTR lines.
sentences.chinese: 新的大围站将成为两条MTR轨道交通线的交汇处。

sentences.english: That is the crossroads where the trade routes from the Arabian Gulf and the trade routes coming from Asia meet.
sentences.chinese: 那里正是发自阿拉伯湾和来自亚洲商船航道的交汇处。

sentences.english: Jinan is at the junction of the Beijing-Shanghai and the Qingdao-Jinan railways.
sentences.chinese: 济南位于京沪铁路线和青济线的交汇处。

sentences.english: An intersection is where two or more roads converge.
sentences.chinese: 是两条或三条路的交汇处。

sentences.english: I still try to find images where pop-culture and philosophy meet.
sentences.chinese: 我依然试图查找图像流行文化与哲学的交汇处。

sentences.english: Frequency improvement and terminal change to Tiu Keng Leng MTR Station Public Transport Interchange.
sentences.chinese: 改善班次，总站迁往调景岭地铁站公共交通交汇处。

sentences.english: The crossroads of science and politics is a dodgy place.
sentences.chinese: 科学与政治的交汇处是个微妙的地方。

definition: variant of 交匯|交汇/to flow together/confluence (of rivers, airflow, roads)/(international) cooperation
to flow together/confluence (of rivers, airflow, roads)/(international) cooperation
to be right next to/close neighbor
to be located at/to be situated at/to lie
to be located at/to be situated in
